creator: muraguri2005@yahoo.com
text:
I am using the commons validator to validate where you use an xml file to validate a bean. There is an error while trying to real the xml that input stream to parse is null. Attached is the jvm.log. What could be the problem. Please respond as soon as possible.
Thanks is advance.

creator: muraguri2005@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 25040
This shows the error log

creator: hoju@visi.com
text:
By "commons validator", I take it you mean?...

http://commons.apache.org/validator/

XMLCommons is not the right project for that.  Not only that, you are asking a question, not reporting a specific bug that can be reproduced.  You should...

1.  Ask your question on the appropriate mailing list [1].

2.  If it turns out that there is a bug, and it is not already reported, you should post your issue to the correct location [2].


[1] http://commons.apache.org/validator/mail-lists.html
[2] https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/VALIDATOR

Marking Invalid.
